'''''The Greenery Out of Space''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series IV]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Dendro Hypostasis]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to 1927 short story ''{{w|The Colour Out of Space}}'' by {{w|H.P. Lovecraft}}.
